verses.verse: Now it came to pass upon a day <WH3117>, that Y'honatan <WH3129> the son <WH1121> of Saul <WH7586> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto the young man <WH5288> that bare <WH5375> <WH8802> his armour <WH3627>, Come <WH3212> <WH8798>, and let us go over <WH5674> <WH8799> to the Philistines <WH6430> ' garrison <WH4673>, that is on the other side <WH5676> <WH1975>. But he told <WH5046> <WH8689> not his father <WH1>.

And Saul <WH7586> tarried <WH3427> <WH8802> in the uttermost <WH7097> part of Giv`ah <WH1390> under a pomegranate tree <WH7416> which is in Migron <WH4051>: and the people <WH5971> that were with him were about six <WH8337> hundred <WH3967> men <WH376>;

And Ahiah <WH281>, the son <WH1121> of Ahitub <WH285>, I-Khavod's <WH350> brother <WH251>, the son <WH1121> of Pinchas <WH6372>, the son <WH1121> of Eli <WH5941>, the YY'S <WH3068> Kohen <WH3548> in Shiloh <WH7887>, wearing <WH5375> <WH8802> an ephod <WH646>. And the people <WH5971> knew <WH3045> <WH8804> not that Y'honatan <WH3129> was gone <WH1980> <WH8804>.

And between the passages <WH4569>, by which Y'honatan <WH3129> sought <WH1245> <WH8765> to go over <WH5674> <WH8800> unto the Philistines <WH6430> ' garrison <WH4673>, there was a sharp <WH8127> rock <WH5553> on the one side <WH5676>, and a sharp <WH8127> rock <WH5553> on the other side <WH5676>: and the name <WH8034> of the one <WH259> was Bozez <WH949>, and the name <WH8034> of the other <WH259> Seneh <WH5573>.

The forefront <WH8127> of the one <WH259> was situate <WH4690> northward <WH6828> over against <WH4136> Michmash <WH4363>, and the other <WH259> southward <WH5045> over against <WH4136> Giv`ah <WH1387>.

And Y'honatan <WH3083> said <WH559> <WH8799> to the young man <WH5288> that bare <WH5375> <WH8802> his armour <WH3627>, Come <WH3212> <WH8798>, and let us go over <WH5674> <WH8799> unto the garrison <WH4673> of these uncircumcised <WH6189>: it may be that the YY <WH3068> will work <WH6213> <WH8799> for us: for there is no restraint <WH4622> to the YY <WH3068> to save <WH3467> <WH8687> by many <WH7227> or by few <WH4592>.

And his armourbearer <WH5375> <WH8802> <WH3627> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto him, Do <WH6213> <WH8798> all that is in thine heart <WH3824>: turn <WH5186> <WH8798> thee; behold, I am with thee according to thy heart <WH3824>.
Then said <WH559> <WH8799> Y'honatan <WH3083>, Behold, we will pass over <WH5674> <WH8802> unto these men <WH582>, and we will discover <WH1540> <WH8738> ourselves unto them.

If they say <WH559> <WH8799> thus unto us, Tarry <WH1826> <WH8798> until we come <WH5060> <WH8687> to you; then we will stand still <WH5975> <WH8804> in our place, and will not go up <WH5927> <WH8799> unto them.

But if they say <WH559> <WH8799> thus, Come up <WH5927> <WH8798> unto us; then we will go up <WH5927> <WH8804>: for the YY <WH3068> hath delivered <WH5414> <WH8804> them into our hand <WH3027>: and this shall be a sign <WH226> unto us.

And both <WH8147> of them discovered <WH1540> <WH8735> themselves unto the garrison <WH4673> of the Philistines <WH6430>: and the Philistines <WH6430> said <WH559> <WH8799>, Behold, the Hebrews <WH5680> come forth <WH3318> <WH8802> out of the holes <WH2356> where they had hid <WH2244> <WH8694> themselves.

And the men <WH582> of the garrison <WH4675> answered <WH6030> <WH8799> Y'honatan <WH3129> and his armourbearer <WH5375> <WH8802> <WH3627>, and said <WH559> <WH8799>, Come up <WH5927> <WH8798> to us, and we will shew <WH3045> <WH8686> you a thing <WH1697>. And Y'honatan <WH3129> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto his armourbearer <WH5375> <WH8802> <WH3627>, Come up <WH5927> <WH8798> after <WH310> me: for the YY <WH3068> hath delivered <WH5414> <WH8804> them into the hand <WH3027> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>.

And Y'honatan <WH3129> climbed up <WH5927> <WH8799> upon his hands <WH3027> and upon his feet <WH7272>, and his armourbearer <WH5375> <WH8802> <WH3627> after <WH310> him: and they fell <WH5307> <WH8799> before <WH6440> Y'honatan <WH3129>; and his armourbearer <WH5375> <WH8802> <WH3627> slew <WH4191> <WH8789> after <WH310> him.

And that first <WH7223> slaughter <WH4347>, which Y'honatan <WH3129> and his armourbearer <WH5375> <WH8802> <WH3627> made <WH5221> <WH8689>, was about twenty <WH6242> men <WH376>, within as it were an half <WH2677> acre <WH4618> of land <WH7704>, which a yoke <WH6776> of oxen might plow.

And there was trembling <WH2731> in the host <WH4264>, in the field <WH7704>, and among all the people <WH5971>: the garrison <WH4673>, and the spoilers <WH7843> <WH8688>, they also trembled <WH2729> <WH8804>, and the earth <WH776> quaked <WH7264> <WH8799>: so it was a very great <WH430> trembling <WH2731>.

And the watchmen <WH6822> <WH8802> of Saul <WH7586> in Giv`ah <WH1390> of Binyamin <WH1144> looked <WH7200> <WH8799>; and, behold, the multitude <WH1995> melted away <WH4127> <WH8738>, and they went <WH3212> <WH8799> on beating down <WH1986> <WH8800> one another.

Then said <WH559> <WH8799> Saul <WH7586> unto the people <WH5971> that were with him, Number <WH6485> <WH8798> now, and see <WH7200> <WH8798> who is gone <WH1980> <WH8804> from us. And when they had numbered <WH6485> <WH8799>, behold, Y'honatan <WH3129> and his armourbearer <WH5375> <WH8802> <WH3627> were not there.

And Saul <WH7586> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto Ahiah <WH281>, Bring hither <WH5066> <WH8685> the ark <WH727> of 'Elohim <WH430>. For the ark <WH727> of 'Elohim <WH430> was at that time <WH3117> with the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>.

And it came to pass, while Saul <WH7586> talked <WH1696> <WH8765> unto the Kohen <WH3548>, that the noise <WH1995> that was in the host <WH4264> of the Philistines <WH6430> went <WH3212> <WH8799> on <WH1980> <WH8800> and increased <WH7227>: and Saul <WH7586> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto the Kohen <WH3548>, Withdraw <WH622> <WH8798> thine hand <WH3027>.

And Saul <WH7586> and all the people <WH5971> that were with him assembled <WH2199> <WH8735> themselves, and they came <WH935> <WH8799> to the battle <WH4421>: and, behold, every man's <WH376> sword <WH2719> was against his fellow <WH7453>, and there was a very <WH3966> great <WH1419> discomfiture <WH4103>.

Moreover the Hebrews <WH5680> that were with the Philistines <WH6430> before <WH865> that time <WH8032>, which went up <WH5927> <WH8804> with them into the camp <WH4264> from the country round about <WH5439>, even they also turned to be with the Yisra'ELites <WH3478> that were with Saul <WH7586> and Y'honatan <WH3129>.

Likewise all the men <WH376> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> which had hid <WH2244> <WH8693> themselves in mount <WH2022> Efrayim <WH669>, when they heard <WH8085> <WH8804> that the Philistines <WH6430> fled <WH5127> <WH8804>, even they also followed hard <WH1692> <WH8686> after <WH310> them in the battle <WH4421>.
So the YY <WH3068> saved <WH3467> <WH8686> Yisra'EL <WH3478> that day <WH3117>: and the battle <WH4421> passed over <WH5674> <WH8804> unto Bethaven <WH1007>.

And the men <WH376> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> were distressed <WH5065> <WH8738> that day <WH3117>: for Saul <WH7586> had adjured <WH422> <WH8686> the people <WH5971>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, Cursed <WH779> <WH8803> be the man <WH376> that eateth <WH398> <WH8799> any food <WH3899> until evening <WH6153>, that I may be avenged <WH5358> <WH8738> on mine enemies <WH341> <WH8802>. So none of the people <WH5971> tasted <WH2938> <WH8804> any food <WH3899>.
And all they of the land <WH776> came <WH935> <WH8804> to a wood <WH3293>; and there was honey <WH1706> upon <WH6440> the ground <WH7704>.

And when the people <WH5971> were come <WH935> <WH8799> into the wood <WH3293>, behold, the honey <WH1706> dropped <WH1982>; but no man put <WH5381> <WH8688> his hand <WH3027> to his mouth <WH6310>: for the people <WH5971> feared <WH3372> <WH8804> the oath <WH7621>.

But Y'honatan <WH3129> heard <WH8085> <WH8804> not when his father <WH1> charged <WH7650> the people <WH5971> with the oath <WH7650> <WH8687>: wherefore he put forth <WH7971> <WH8799> the end <WH7097> of the rod <WH4294> that was in his hand <WH3027>, and dipped <WH2881> <WH8799> it in an honeycomb <WH3295> <WH1706>, and put <WH7725> <WH8686> his hand <WH3027> to his mouth <WH6310>; and his eyes <WH5869> were enlightened <WH215> <WH8799>.

Then answered <WH6030> <WH8799> one <WH376> of the people <WH5971>, and said <WH559> <WH8799>, Thy father <WH1> straitly <WH7650> <WH8687> charged <WH7650> the people <WH5971> with an oath <WH7650> <WH8689>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, Cursed <WH779> <WH8803> be the man <WH376> that eateth <WH398> <WH8799> any food <WH3899> this day <WH3117>. And the people <WH5971> were faint <WH5774> <WH8799>.

Then said <WH559> <WH8799> Y'honatan <WH3129>, My father <WH1> hath troubled <WH5916> <WH8804> the land <WH776>: see <WH7200> <WH8798>, I pray you, how mine eyes <WH5869> have been enlightened <WH215> <WH8804>, because I tasted <WH2938> <WH8804> a little <WH4592> of this honey <WH1706>.

How much more <WH637>, if haply <WH3863> the people <WH5971> had eaten <WH398> <WH8804> freely <WH398> <WH8800> to day <WH3117> of the spoil <WH7998> of their enemies <WH341> <WH8802> which they found <WH4672> <WH8804>? for had there not been now a much greater <WH7235> <WH8804> slaughter <WH4347> among the Philistines <WH6430> ?
And they smote <WH5221> <WH8686> the Philistines <WH6430> that day <WH3117> from Michmash <WH4363> to Aijalon <WH357>: and the people <WH5971> were very <WH3966> faint <WH5774> <WH8799>.

And the people <WH5971> flew <WH5860> <WH8799> <WH6213> <WH8799> upon the spoil <WH7998>, and took <WH3947> <WH8799> sheep <WH6629>, and oxen <WH1241>, and calves <WH1121>, and slew <WH7819> <WH8799> them on the ground <WH776>: and the people <WH5971> did eat <WH398> <WH8799> them with the blood <WH1818>.

Then they told <WH5046> <WH8686> Saul <WH7586>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, Behold, the people <WH5971> sin <WH2398> <WH8802> against the YY <WH3068>, in that they eat <WH398> <WH8800> with the blood <WH1818>. And he said <WH559> <WH8799>, Ye have transgressed <WH898> <WH8804>: roll <WH1556> <WH8798> a great <WH1419> stone <WH68> unto me this day <WH3117>.

And Saul <WH7586> said <WH559> <WH8799>, Disperse <WH6327> <WH8798> yourselves among the people <WH5971>, and say <WH559> <WH8804> unto them, Bring me hither <WH5066> <WH8685> every man <WH376> his ox <WH7794>, and every man <WH376> his sheep <WH7716>, and slay <WH7819> <WH8804> them here, and eat <WH398> <WH8804>; and sin <WH2398> <WH8799> not against the YY <WH3068> in eating <WH398> <WH8800> with the blood <WH1818>. And all the people <WH5971> brought <WH5066> <WH8686> every man <WH376> his ox <WH7794> with him <WH3027> that night <WH3915>, and slew <WH7819> <WH8799> them there.
And Saul <WH7586> built <WH1129> <WH8799> an altar <WH4196> unto the YY <WH3068>: the same was the first <WH2490> <WH8689> altar <WH4196> that he built <WH1129> <WH8800> unto the YY <WH3068>.

And Saul <WH7586> said <WH559> <WH8799>, Let us go down <WH3381> <WH8799> after <WH310> the Philistines <WH6430> by night <WH3915>, and spoil <WH962> <WH8799> them until the morning <WH1242> light <WH216>, and let us not leave <WH7604> <WH8686> a man <WH376> of them. And they said <WH559> <WH8799>, Do <WH6213> <WH8798> whatsoever seemeth <WH5869> good <WH2896> unto thee. Then said <WH559> <WH8799> the Kohen <WH3548>, Let us draw near <WH7126> <WH8799> hither <WH1988> unto 'Elohim <WH430>.

And Saul <WH7586> asked <WH7592> <WH8799> counsel of 'Elohim <WH430>, Shall I go down <WH3381> <WH8799> after <WH310> the Philistines <WH6430>? wilt thou deliver <WH5414> <WH8799> them into the hand <WH3027> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>? But he answered <WH6030> <WH8804> him not that day <WH3117>.

And Saul <WH7586> said <WH559> <WH8799>, Draw ye near <WH5066> <WH8798> hither <WH1988>, all the chief <WH6438> of the people <WH5971>: and know <WH3045> <WH8798> and see <WH7200> <WH8798> wherein <WH4100> this sin <WH2403> hath been this day <WH3117>.

For, as the YY <WH3068> liveth <WH2416>, which saveth <WH3467> <WH8688> Yisra'EL <WH3478>, though it be <WH3426> in Y'honatan <WH3129> my son <WH1121>, he shall surely <WH4191> <WH8800> die <WH4191> <WH8799>. But there was not a man among all the people <WH5971> that answered <WH6030> <WH8802> him.

Then said <WH559> <WH8799> he unto all Yisra'EL <WH3478>, Be ye on one <WH259> side <WH5676>, and I and Y'honatan <WH3129> my son <WH1121> will be on the other <WH259> side <WH5676>. And the people <WH5971> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto Saul <WH7586>, Do <WH6213> <WH8798> what seemeth <WH5869> good <WH2896> unto thee.

Therefore Saul <WH7586> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto the YY <WH3068> 'Elohim <WH430> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, Give <WH3051> <WH8798> a perfect <WH8549> lot. And Saul <WH7586> and Y'honatan <WH3129> were taken <WH3920> <WH8735>: but the people <WH5971> escaped <WH3318> <WH8804>.
And Saul <WH7586> said <WH559> <WH8799>, Cast <WH5307> <WH8685> lots between me and Y'honatan <WH3129> my son <WH1121>. And Y'honatan <WH3129> was taken <WH3920> <WH8735>.

Then Saul <WH7586> said <WH559> <WH8799> to Y'honatan <WH3129>, Tell <WH5046> <WH8685> me what thou hast done <WH6213> <WH8804>. And Y'honatan <WH3129> told <WH5046> <WH8686> him, and said <WH559> <WH8799>, I did but <WH2938> <WH8800> taste <WH2938> <WH8804> a little <WH4592> honey <WH1706> with the end <WH7097> of the rod <WH4294> that was in mine hand <WH3027>, and, lo <WH2009>, I must die <WH4191> <WH8799>.

And Saul <WH7586> answered <WH559> <WH8799>, 'Elohim <WH430> do so <WH6213> <WH8799> and more also <WH3254> <WH8686>: for thou shalt surely <WH4191> <WH8800> die <WH4191> <WH8799>, Y'honatan <WH3129>.

And the people <WH5971> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto Saul <WH7586>, Shall Y'honatan <WH3129> die <WH4191> <WH8799>, who hath wrought <WH6213> <WH8804> this great <WH1419> salvation <WH3444> in Yisra'EL <WH3478>? 'Elohim forbid <WH2486>: as the YY <WH3068> liveth <WH2416>, there shall not one hair <WH8185> of his head <WH7218> fall <WH5307> <WH8799> to the ground <WH776>; for he hath wrought <WH6213> <WH8804> with 'Elohim <WH430> this day <WH3117>. So the people <WH5971> rescued <WH6299> <WH8799> Y'honatan <WH3129>, that he died <WH4191> <WH8804> not.
Then Saul <WH7586> went up <WH5927> <WH8799> from following <WH310> the Philistines <WH6430>: and the Philistines <WH6430> went <WH1980> <WH8804> to their own place <WH4725>.

So Saul <WH7586> took <WH3920> <WH8804> the kingdom <WH4410> over Yisra'EL <WH3478>, and fought <WH3898> <WH8735> against all his enemies <WH341> <WH8802> on every side <WH5439>, against Moab <WH4124>, and against the children <WH1121> of Ammon <WH5983>, and against Edom <WH123>, and against the kings <WH4428> of Zobah <WH6678>, and against the Philistines <WH6430>: and whithersoever he turned <WH6437> <WH8799> himself, he vexed <WH7561> <WH8686> them.

And he gathered <WH6213> <WH8799> an host <WH2428>, and smote <WH5221> <WH8686> the Amalekites <WH6002>, and delivered <WH5337> <WH8686> Yisra'EL <WH3478> out of the hands <WH3027> of them that spoiled <WH8154> <WH8802> them.

Now the sons <WH1121> of Saul <WH7586> were Y'honatan <WH3129>, and Ishui <WH3440>, and Melchishua <WH4444>: and the names <WH8034> of his two <WH8147> daughters <WH1323> were these; the name <WH8034> of the firstborn <WH1067> Merab <WH4764>, and the name <WH8034> of the younger <WH6996> Mikhal <WH4324>:

And the name <WH8034> of Saul's <WH7586> wife <WH802> was Ahinoam <WH293>, the daughter <WH1323> of Ahimaaz <WH290>: and the name <WH8034> of the captain <WH8269> of his host <WH6635> was Abner <WH74>, the son <WH1121> of Ner <WH5369>, Saul's <WH7586> uncle <WH1730>.
And Kish <WH7027> was the father <WH1> of Saul <WH7586>; and Ner <WH5369> the father <WH1> of Abner <WH74> was the son <WH1121> of Abiel <WH22>.

And there was sore <WH2389> war <WH4421> against the Philistines <WH6430> all the days <WH3117> of Saul <WH7586>: and when Saul <WH7586> saw <WH7200> <WH8804> any strong <WH1368> man <WH376>, or any valiant <WH2428> man <WH1121>, he took <WH622> <WH8799> him unto him.
